original_text: Seven other cows came up after them, poor and very ugly and thin, such as I had never seen in all the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 그 뒤에 또 약하고 심히 흉하고 파리한 일곱 암소가 올라오니 그같이 흉한 것들은 애굽 땅에서 내가 아직 보지 못한 것이라

sentences.original_text: Seven other cows came up after them
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱 마리의 다른 소가 그 뒤에 올라왔고

sentences.original_text: poor and very ugly and thin
such as I had never seen
in all the land of Egypt
